analyzed: vijñaptimātram eva idam asat artha avabhāsanāt
yadvat taimirikasya asat keśoṇḍraka ādi darśanam
na deśa kāla niyamaḥ santāna aniyamaḥ na ca

original: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptiryadi nārthataḥ // Vvṛ_2 //
analyzed: na ca kṛtya kriyā yuktā vijñaptiḥ yadi na arthataḥ
deśa ādi niyamaḥ siddhaḥ svapna vat preta vat punar
santāna aniyamaḥ sarvaiḥ pūya nadī ādi darśane
svapna upaghāta vat kṛtya kriyā naraka vat punar
sarvam naraka pāla ādi darśane taiḥ ca bādhane

original: tiraścāṃ sambhavaḥ svarge yathā ca narake tathā /
analyzed: tiraścām sambhavaḥ svarge yathā ca narake tathā

original: na pretānāṃ yatastajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te // Vvṛ_5 //
analyzed: na pretānām yatas tad jam duḥkham na anubhavanti te
yadi tad karmabhiḥ tatra bhūtānām sambhavaḥ tathā

original: iṣyate pariṇāmaśca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate // Vvṛ_6 //
analyzed: iṣyate pariṇāmaḥ ca kim vijñānasya na iṣyate
karmaṇaḥ vāsanā anyatra phalam anyatra kalpyate

original: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ // Vvṛ_7 //
analyzed: tatra eva nā iṣyate yatra vāsanā kim nu kāraṇam
rūpa ādi āyatana astitvam tad vineya janam prati
abhiprāya vaśāt uktam upapāduka sattva vat

original: nāstīha satva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ
analyzed: nā asti iha satvaḥ ātmā vā dharmāḥ tu ete sa hetukāḥ
yatas sva bījāt vijñaptiḥ yad ābhāsā pravartate
dvividha āyatana tvena te tasyāḥ muniḥ abravīt
tathā pudgala nairātmya praveśaḥ hi anyathā punar
deśanā dharma nairātmya praveśaḥ kalpita ātmanā

original: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
analyzed: na tat ekam na ca anekam viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśas

original: na ca te saṃhatā yasmātparamāṇurna sidhyati // Vvṛ_11 //
analyzed: na ca te saṃhatāḥ yasmāt paramāṇuḥ na sidhyati
ṣaṭkena yugapad yogāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaṣ aṃśa tā
ṣaṇṇām samāna deśa tvāt piṇḍaḥ syāt aṇu mātrakaḥ
paramāṇoḥ asaṃyoge tad saṅghāte asti kasya saḥ

original: na cānavayavatvena tatsaṃyogād na sidhyati // Vvṛ_13 //
analyzed: na ca anavayavatvena tad saṃyogāt na sidhyati
di bhāga bhedaḥ yasya asti tasya ekatvam na yujyate

original: chāyāvṛtī kathaṃ vā anyo na piṇḍaścenna tasya te // Vvṛ_14 //
analyzed: chāyā āvṛtī katham vā anyaḥ na piṇḍaḥ ced na tasya te
eka tve na krameṇa ītiḥ yugapad na graha agrahau

original: vicchinnānekavṛttiśca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet // Vvṛ_15 //
analyzed: vicchinna aneka vṛttiḥ ca sūkṣma anīkṣā ca no bhavet

original: pratyakṣabuddhiḥ svapnādau yathā sa ca yadā tadā /
analyzed: pratyakṣa buddhiḥ svapna ādau yathā sa ca yadā tadā

original: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ // Vvṛ_16 //
analyzed: na saḥ arthaḥ dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣa tvam katham matam

original: uktaṃ yathā tadābhāsā vijñaptiḥ smaraṇaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: uktam yathā tad ābhāsā vijñaptiḥ smaraṇam tatas
svapna dṛś viṣaya abhāvam na aprabuddhaḥ avagacchati
anyonya adhipati tvena vijñapti niyamaḥ mithas

original: middhenopahataṃ cittaṃ svapne tenāsamaṃ phalaṃ // Vvṛ_18 //
analyzed: middhena upahatam cittam svapne tena asamam phalam
maraṇam para vijñapti viśeṣāt vikriyā yathā
smṛti lopa ādikāni eṣām piśāca ādi manaḥ vaśāt
katham vā daṇḍaka araṇya śūnyatvam ṛṣi kopataḥ

original: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati // Vvṛ_20 //
analyzed: manodaṇḍaḥ mahā avadyaḥ katham vā tena sidhyati
para citta vidām jñānam ayathārtham katham yathā
sva citta jñānam ajñānāt yathā buddhasya gocaraḥ
vijñapti mātra tā siddhiḥ sva śakti sadṛśī mayā

original: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā buddhagocaraḥ // Vvṛ_22 //
analyzed: kṛtā iyam sarvathā sā tu na cintyā buddha gocaraḥ
viṃśatikā vijñaptimātra tā siddhiḥ
kṛtiḥ iyam ācārya vasubandhoḥ
